text:
@ThisIsAeroPlane 
No, they weren't cracking necks.  They put the guards in a choke hold.  That's when you get your opponent around the neck and put pressure on their carotid artery.  Knocks them out cold.  Well, that's what Drake did anyway.  You can never be too sure about Flynn. ;p
